title: A space for grief: How Hannah Beachler designed the world of Wakanda Forever
content:
In an interview with Hannah Beachler, the production designer explains how she realized a space for her characters and audience to grieve.

A column of red-gold flames bounds across the floor and up the wall of the Wakandan throne room. Amber light obtrudes the iridescent purple hues of land of the Wakandan Ancestors as radiating flames engulf the space. The source of these flames is Princess Shuriâ€™s rage in her grief.
